channel.title: Wonder Woman on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Wonder Woman on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: James Gunn Says Casting for New Wonder Woman Hasn’t Started Yet But Film Is a “Priority”
item.description: The ‘Superman’ director also shut down rumors that DC Studios is looking to cast an actress “with a TV-centric resume, akin to Supergirl’s Milly Alcock" for the titular role.

item.title: James Gunn Says Casting for New Wonder Woman Hasn’t Started Yet But Film Is a “Priority”
item.description: The ‘Superman’ director also shut down rumors that DC Studios is looking to cast an actress “with a TV-centric resume, akin to Supergirl’s Milly Alcock" for the titular role.
